title: Charms
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

The **Charms** school of magic includes spells which positively affect yourself, providing improved offense, defence, speed, or other beneficial enhancements until they wear off. Although they never directly affect other targets, they can greatly increase your ability to survive.

## History

- The Charms skill was removed in [0.26](/0.26 "0.26").

  - [Shroud of Golubria](/Shroud_of_Golubria "Shroud of Golubria") was removed.
  - [Spectral Weapon](/Spectral_Weapon "Spectral Weapon") became the [spectral](/Spectral "Spectral") weapon [brand](/Brand "Brand") in [0.26](/0.26 "0.26"), [Deflect Missiles](/Deflect_Missiles "Deflect Missiles") was already represented with the [repulsion](/Repulsion "Repulsion") [scarf](/Scarf "Scarf") ego, while [Ring of Flames](/Ring_of_Flames "Ring of Flames")' effect was given to the [unrand](/Unrand "Unrand") [salamander hide armour](/Salamander_hide_armour "Salamander hide armour"). Finally, [Infusion](/Infusion_\(spell\) "Infusion (spell)") inspired the [glove ego](/Infusion_\(ego\) "Infusion (ego)") introduced in [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"). All four spells were removed.
  - [Song of Slaying](/Song_of_Slaying "Song of Slaying") was renamed to [Wereblood](/Wereblood "Wereblood") and moved to [Transmutations](/Transmutations "Transmutations").
  - [Ozocubu's Armour](/Ozocubu%27s_Armour "Ozocubu's Armour"), [Excruciating Wounds](/Excruciating_Wounds "Excruciating Wounds") and [Iskenderun's Battlesphere](/Iskenderun%27s_Battlesphere "Iskenderun's Battlesphere") had their Charms aspect removed, and were altered in the process. [Death's Door](/Death%27s_Door "Death's Door") became a level 9 pure Necromancy spell.

- In [0.25](/0.25 "0.25"), [Regeneration](/Regeneration "Regeneration") was removed.

- In [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), the [Haste](/Haste "Haste") spell was removed.

- In [0.17](/0.17 "0.17"), [Control Teleport](/Control_Teleport "Control Teleport"), along with the intrinsic, was removed.

- Many Charms spells were also removed, over time. Examples include weapon [branding](/Brand "Brand") spells (like [Fire Brand](/Fire_Brand "Fire Brand")), ones that gave resistances or intrinsics (like [Insulation](/Insulation "Insulation")), and [Extension](/Extension "Extension").

- In [0.8](/0.8 "0.8"), the [Enchantments](/Enchantments "Enchantments") school was split in order to create Charms and Hexes.

History

  • The Charms skill was removed in 0.26.
    • Shroud of Golubria was removed.
    • Spectral Weapon became the spectral weapon brand in 0.26, Deflect Missiles was already represented with the repulsion scarf ego, while Ring of Flames' effect was given to the unrand salamander hide armour. Finally, Infusion inspired the glove ego introduced in 0.28. All four spells were removed.
    • Song of Slaying was renamed to Wereblood and moved to Transmutations.
    • Ozocubu's Armour, Excruciating Wounds and Iskenderun's Battlesphere had their Charms aspect removed, and were altered in the process. Death's Door became a level 9 pure Necromancy spell.
  • In 0.25, Regeneration was removed.
  • In 0.19, the Haste spell was removed.
  • In 0.17, Control Teleport, along with the intrinsic, was removed.
  • Many Charms spells were also removed, over time. Examples include weapon branding spells (like Fire Brand), ones that gave resistances or intrinsics (like Insulation), and Extension.
  • In 0.8, the Enchantments school was split in order to create Charms and Hexes.
